Q1. Accept a number from user - if it is divisible by 3 print “fun” , if it is divisible 
by 7 print “buzz” 
and if it is divisible by both(3,7) print “fun -buzz” . [ Two answer] 

solution---
	package test;

public class DivisibilityCheck {
	public static void div_check(int n) {
		int n1 = 0;
		n=n1;
		if(n1 % 3==0 && n1 % 7==0)
			System.out.println("fun-buzz");
		else if(n1 % 3==0)
			System.out.println("fun");
		else if(n1 % 7==0)
			System.out.println("buzz");
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		DivisibilityCheck.div_check(15);

	}

}

Q2. Accept a start number from user and end number from user. Print all  odd 
number between start and end number. [ Two Answer]

solution--
	package test;
import static java.lang.System.out;
public class OddCheck {
	
	public static void oddrange(int s, int e) {
		boolean bool=isodd(s);

	if (bool==false)
		s=s+1;
	for(int i=s;i<=e;i=i+2) 
	{
		out.print(" "+i);
	}
	}
	
	private static boolean isodd(int n) {
		return n % 2 !=0;
		
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		OddCheck.oddrange(2, 25);
	}

}

Q3. Accept a number from user and check if it is palindrome number or not eg 
(121) 

solution--
package test;

public class Palindrome_Check {
 
	public static boolean main(int no) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int r,n,rev=0;
		n=no;
		while(no!=0) {
			r=no%10;
			rev=rev*10+r;
			no=no/10;
			
		}
		if(rev==n)
			return true;
		return false;

	}

}

Que3] Accept a term from the user and print Fibonacci series
package logic;
import static java.lang.System.out;
public class FibonacciLogic {

	public static void fib(int s) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	int a,b,c;
	a=0;
	b=1;
	
	out.print(a+" "+b);
	if(s>2) {
		for(int i=1; i<=2;i++) {
			c=a+b;
			out.print(" "+c);
			a=b;
			b=c;
		}
	}
	
	

	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		FibonacciLogic.fib(5);
	}

}

Que4] Accept start no and end no and print all odd no between them
package test;
import static java.lang.System.out;

public class OddLogic {

	public static void oddrange(int s,int e) {
		boolean b=isodd(s);
		if(b==false)
			s=s+1;
		for (int i=s;i<=e;i=i+2) {
			out.print(i);
		}
	}
	private static boolean isodd(int n) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return n%2 !=0;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		OddLogic.oddrange(1,20);

	}

}
